text: Navu avarannu hanneradu kula gotragalagi vingadisidevu. Musarodane avara janangavu nirannu kelidaga ‘‘a kallina mele nim'ma urugolininda hodeyiri’’ endu navu avaredege divyavaniyannu kalisidevu; aga adarinda hanneradu cilumegalu hariyatodagidavu. Pratiyobbaru tam'ma jalamulavannu gurutisikondaru. Navu avara mele modada neralannu avarisidevu. Avarige mann mattu salva (emba ahara samagri)galannu ilisikottevu.‘‘Nimage odagisalagiruva sud'dha vastugalinda tinniri’’ (endu avarige adesisalagittu. Idannu miruva mulaka) avaru nam'ma melenu akrama vesagalilla. Avaru svatah tam'ma meleye akramavesagikondaru
